dict.acceptation: 紧的，牢固的；绷紧的；不漏的；密集的，紧凑的；

sent.orig: Play tight. Play tight in loose Playloose games only. www. qqpub. cn.
sent.trans: 要想赢，只能在打得松的台子上打紧。别无他法。

sent.orig: Play tight. Play tight in loose games.
sent.trans: 只能在打得松的台子上打紧。

sent.orig: Gate and globe (metal to metal) seats cannot bubble tight shut offbubble tight by design.
sent.trans: 闸阀和截止阀（金属与金属连接）的阀座不具备不透气关闭的性能。

sent.orig: They water-tight and air tight to protect goods from being damaged by heat, water or dampness.
sent.trans: 而且不透水、不透空气以保护货物不致因高温、水或潮湿而受损。

sent.orig: Good. Triple-check all counter sensor packages. Make absolutely sure we are locked down tight. Very tight.
sent.trans: 很好。第三次检查反传感器包。绝对确保我们锁定得很紧密。非常紧密。
